title: IS: Infinite Stratos 2 - Hitonatsu no Omoide
alternative_title: IS 〈インフィニット・ストラトス〉2 ロングバケーション 一夏（ひとなつ）の想いで
description: New 40-minute OVA to be released on October 30, 2013. It will be a longer version of the second season's first episode, which is under the same title.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
